thread.title: Ghana coach Avram Grant tours White House with his controversial agent Saif Rubie
thread.title_full: Ghana coach Avram Grant tours White House with his controversial agent Saif Rubie

title: Ghana coach Avram Grant tours White House with his controversial agent Saif Rubie
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 03:55 CET Ghana coach Avram Grant tours White House with his controversial agent Saif Rubie - www.ghanasoccernet.com Avram Grant in the company of his agent Saif Rubie at the White House 
Ghana coach Avram Grant took time off to visit the White House on Monday alongside his agent Saif Rubie. 
The former Chelsea boss is in Washington with his Black Stars team who play Canada in an international friendly on Tuesday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
